app_description.heading: Have the numbers been calling to you?!
paragraphs: If you’re interested in the mystical art of numerology, then you’re joining a long line of ancient truth seekers.

Since ancient times, people from all corners of the world have understood the power inherent in numbers. And here, in our modern-day, this spiritual sister-science of astrology is making something of a come-back!

The origins of numerology are somewhat of a mystery. The earliest instances of finding meaning in numbers were in ancient Egyptian and Babylonian civilizations. There is evidence of numerology being used thousands of years ago in Rome, Greece, China and Japan too.
